page.title: 05Trade.
page.content:
My take away is Chinese and is called the Silver Moon. My parents came from Hong_Kong 16 years ago and opened our shop.We open from 11.30 to 2p.m every day except Sunday.We are open every evening from 7 p.m till 11.30 but on Fridays and Saturdays we close at midnight.The busiest day is Saturday. most people get there meals then.We start to prepare the meals \ an hour before we open.my mother and father and my two sisters prepare the meals we have four very large woks;one of them is for frying and the others for cooking.A lot of our ingredients come from Hong_Kong.Most people buy chips and house special,which is a mixture of stir fried vegetables and meat.
by Sonia Lee
